name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Helpdesk Engineer with 9+ years of extensive experience in IT support and system administration. Proficient in providing technical support for both **Windows** and **macOS** platforms, utilizing tools such as **Google Workspace**, **Slack**, and **JumpCloud** for efficient communication and task management. Expertise in troubleshooting and resolving issues related to **SentinelOne**, **MFA**, **VPN**, with solid knowledge in scripting using **PowerShell**, **Bash**, and **Python** for automation and process improvement. Experienced in working with cloud platforms including **Google Cloud**, **AWS**, and **Azure**. A proven collaborator with strong interpersonal skills, adept at supporting cross-functional teams and enhancing service delivery to ensure optimal performance and user satisfaction.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Windows**, **macOS**, and **Google Cloud** to support and troubleshoot user issues, ensuring a satisfactory resolution rate of 95%.
Implemented and managed **Google Workspace** and **Slack** for streamlined communication and collaboration among team members, reducing response time by 30%.
Configured and maintained **JumpCloud** for identity management and single sign-on (SSO), improving security measures and user access management.
Provided tier 2 support for **Zendesk**, effectively resolving customer inquiries and improving ticket resolution time by 40%.
Managed incident response procedures using **SentinelOne** for endpoint security, ensuring the prevention of 99% of potential threats.
Automated repetitive tasks using **PowerShell** and **Bash**, resulting in a 25% efficiency increase in daily operations.
Conducted onboarding sessions for new employees on **MFA** and VPN setups, enhancing security awareness across the organization.
Trained teams on troubleshooting techniques for **AWS** and **Azure** services, which improved the team's confidence in managing cloud resources.
Maintained accurate records of support requests and solutions in **Linear**, promoting transparency and accountability within the support team.

Utilized **Google Cloud** and **AWS** to streamline cloud service access and optimize user support processes.
Administered tools like **Slack**, **Zendesk**, and **Linear** to enhance communication and ticket management, leading to a 20% reduction in response times.
Implemented multi-factor authentication (MFA) and **VPN** configurations, increasing security by 35% for remote access.
Scripts developed in **PowerShell** and **Bash** for automating routine maintenance tasks, improving efficiency by 40%.
Led system troubleshooting initiatives across **Windows** and **macOS**, resolving 95% of issues on the first contact.
Managed user access and permissions through **JumpCloud**, ensuring compliance and secure user environments for over 500 users.
Provided ongoing support and training using **Google Workspace**, enhancing overall team productivity by 15%.
Conducted regular system performance reviews and updates, maintaining a consistent uptime of 99.9%.
Imparted mentorship and training to junior staff, fostering a collaborative work environment and improving team skillsets.
Developed documentation and resources, reducing onboarding time for new hires by 30%.

Managed and supported **Windows** and **macOS** systems, ensuring high availability and performance for end-users.
Utilized **Google Workspace** and **Slack** for effective team communication and collaboration, enhancing response times by **30%**.
Implemented **JumpCloud** for user identity management, streamlining access control and improving security measures.
Provided technical support for **Zendesk**, resolving tickets with a resolution rate of **95%** within **24 hours**.
Administered project management activities using **Linear**, improving project tracking efficiency.
Monitored and maintained **SentinelOne** deployments to safeguard systems against threats, achieving a **zero** breach rate.
Configured and supported **Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)** and **VPN** solutions to ensure secure remote access.
Developed automation scripts using **PowerShell** and **Bash** to enhance workflow efficiency by **40%**.
Wrote and maintained Python scripts for automating routine tasks, significantly reducing manual effort.
Participated in regular system audits and assessments to ensure compliance with best practices and company policies.
